WotD26 - Smile

Aug 21, 2015

A smile is such a profound and simple thing. Somehow more meaningful and less purposeful than laughter.

It connects us to other peopleÂ and fools your brain into thinking you're happy.

So why don't we do it more? After all the interwebs is full of cute cat videos...
